workshop.title: Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse: Getting Started Workshop
workshop.description: This workshop will show you how to get started with Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse  in the Oracle Public Cloud.

labs.title: Step 1: Provisioning and Connecting
labs.description: Building your first Autonomous Data Warehouse instance and connecting with SQL Developer

labs.title: Step 2: Working with Database Services and Sample Data Sets
labs.description: Understanding the different levels of database services and the sample Star Schema Benchmark (SSB) and Sales History (SH) datasets provided with ADWC

labs.title: Step 3: Loading Data
labs.description: Instructions to load data from Object Stores using SQL Developer and/or PL/SQL

labs.title: Step 4: Querying An External Data File
labs.description: Instructions to define and query external tables based on Object Store datasets

labs.title: Step 5: Managing and Monitoring Your Data Warehouse Instance using the Cloud Console
labs.description: Understanding how to use the ADWC Console to monitor, start/stop, and recover your ADWC instance

labs.title: Step 6: Scaling and Performance in Autonomous Data Warehouse
labs.description: Understanding how to scale your data warehouse instance and its effect on performance and concurrency

labs.title: Step 7: Using Oracle Machine Learning Notebooks
labs.description: Building SQL reports and dashboards using Oracle Machine Learning SQL notebooks

labs.title: Step 8: Simple Introduction to Machine Learning
labs.description: Learn to use the machine learning DBMS_PREDICTIVE_ANALYTICS package to build a more sophisticated notebook

labs.title: Step 9: Using Data Visualization Desktop
labs.description: Learn to how to connect Data Visualization Desktop to your Autonomous Data Warehouse and build interactive reports

labs.title: Step 10: Using Oracle Data Integration Platform Cloud with your Autonomous Data Warehouse
labs.description: Learn to use Oracle Data Integration Platform Cloud (DIPC) to extract, transform and load data into your Autonomous Data Warehouse
